Part (B1) & (B2): XFdtd 1#

Part (B) pertains to XFdtd.

Part (B1)#

Todo

exactly what information are we talking about here (in docstring?)

should be more specific.

Prepares and runs simulation_PEC.xmacro with information such as the parameters of the antennas. The xmacro is mainly made of two xmacro-skeleton text files (see the CAT SECTION of part_b_job1.py).

Path

Evolutionary_loop/Loop_Parts/part_b_job1.py

Usage

python3 part_b_job1.py <indiv> <gen> <npop> <working_dir> <run_name> <xmacros_dir> <xf_proj> <geo_factor> <num_keys> <curved> <nsections>

Outout

$XmacrosDir/simulation_PEC.xmacro

Help

>> python3 part_b_job1.py -h

reference

1

Rolla, Julie. Dissertation Appendix A. Section A.3.1.2
